author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Sascha Rodekamp "Security Update for forgotten passwords " (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3842) - OFBIZ-3842

Improve the a random Password generation when the "require new password" function is called. In the current Trunk it's a kind of hard coded password that will be send to the user. After generating a new pass the "requireNewPassword" flag will be set to true (configurable).
